message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. You get a good deal considering the inflation!
I'm feeling the inflation pinch already, Alice. Let's make this quick and fair.
The inflation will only get worse for you, Bob. This is a fair deal.
Alice, we're losing time and money. I'm proposing a better split for me, but you'll still come out ahead. Let's be sensible.
Bob, time is running out. This offer is good for both of us, considering the inflation you're facing.
Alice, this back and forth is pointless.  This is my final offer.  Take it or leave it.
